sqlMap.insert:
select alf_activity_feed_seq.nextval as value from dual
insert into alf_activity_feed (id, activity_type, activity_summary, activity_format, feed_user_id, post_user_id, post_date, post_id, site_network, app_tool, feed_date) values (#id#, #activityType#, #activitySummary#, #activitySummaryFormat#, #feedUserId#, #postUserId#, #postDate#, #postId#, #siteNetwork#, #appTool#, #feedDate#)
